title: ABSTRACT ART
subtitle: Explore my collection of remixes and musical productions
description: A selection of my best works in electronic music, from bootlegs to official remixes. Each track represents a unique exploration in the world of sound.

contact.location: Based in: New York, New York

tracks.title: BODYBANGERS vs HAYLEY PARSONS
tracks.subtitle: Sunglasses at Night (RadioChi Remix)
tracks.description: An energetic remix that combines dance and electro house elements, transforming the 80s classic into a modern dancefloor experience.

tracks.title: John NEWMAN
tracks.subtitle: Losing Sleep (Mr.Chi Private Bootleg)
tracks.description: A private bootleg that reimagines John Newman's hit with progressive house elements and analog synthesizers.

tracks.title: Ride Gypsy White Hourse
tracks.subtitle: Mr.Chi Bootleg Private Track
tracks.description: An experimental fusion that combines ethnic elements with modern electronic beats, creating a unique and immersive atmosphere.

tracks.title: Wonderland Avenue Vs Stefano Noferini
tracks.subtitle: Clamy White Hourse (Mr.Chi Bootleg)
tracks.description: An innovative mashup that fuses two different musical worlds, creating a completely new and exciting sonic experience.

tracks.title: FM AUDIO
tracks.subtitle: Killer (MR.CHI EDIT)
tracks.description: A reinterpretation of the FM Audio classic with electro house elements and powerful synthesizers that elevate the original energy.

tracks.title: ANOUK
tracks.subtitle: NEW DAY (RadioChi Teaser Remix)
tracks.description: A teaser remix that transforms Anouk's emotional ballad into an energetic and emotional dance floor experience.
